projects.name: Quantum-Universal-Education.github.io
projects.description: Welcome to this community-driven, open-source educational website for learning about all aspects of quantum computing across the full stack, from hardware to algorithms to everything in between and adjacent!  Whether you are new to quantum science, filling in gaps in your foundation of knowledge, or supplementing a course you are taking, our goal is to help you learn based on your interests and background knowledge.  We are always open to recommendations and contributions from the quantum computing community.
